details:
verb
- put (an image) into focus
= synonyms: focus
- become sharp or sharper
= example: become sharp or sharper
- make crisp or more crisp and precise
= example: make crisp or more crisp and precise
- make (one's senses) more acute
= example: make (one's senses) more acute
= synonyms: heighten
- give a point to
= synonyms: taper
- raise the pitch of (musical notes)
- make sharp or sharper
= example: make sharp or sharper
- make (images or sounds) sharp or sharper
